Table.tableName: Demographic and clinical data of 30 patients according to the presence of RAS at angiography
Table.tableFooter: BMI: corporeal mass index SP: systolic pressure DP: diastolic pressure; HR: heart rate Cr: serum creatinine (normal < 1,50 mg/dl); RAS = renal artery stenosis

Document.DocumentTitle: The contrast-enhanced Doppler ultrasound with perfluorocarbon exposed sonicated albumin does not improve the diagnosis of renal artery stenosis compared with angiography
